arts.ttl: ‘I had him in a headlock at half-time!’ - Nathan Jones on Charlton Athletic’s set-piece strength after Orient comeback
arts.sum: Charlton Athletic boss Nathan Jones says he’s not worried about how his side win games – but he was delighted they scored twice from set-pieces at Leyton Orient. Asked about the work that Brayne has done with the side, Jones joked: “Well, I had him in a headlock at half-time because I didn’t feel we had that conviction in our set-plays.

arts.ttl: Leyton Orient stunned by late Charlton comeback
arts.sum: The Addicks trailed going into stoppage time but won 2-1 with goals from Macauley Gillesphey and Kayne Ramsay.

Leyton Orient round off what has been a nightmare run of fixtures with yet another huge clash against the team just goal difference below them in the league table. The O's were beaten at leaders Birm...

arts.ttl: ‘Could edge it’ – Leyton Orient vs Charlton Athletic prediction: The72
arts.sum: The72's writers offer their Leyton Orient vs Charlton Athletic prediction ahead of the League One clash on Saturday. The post ‘Could edge it’ – Leyton Orient vs Charlton Athletic prediction: The72 appeared first on The72 - Football League News.

arts.ttl: Exclusive interview with Charlton Athletic play-off winner Darren Pratley - still going strong at Leyton Orient
arts.sum: “It is up to the club as well because at 40 years of age, I don’t think I’d want to go to another club – start all over again, try to get an affiliation with the fans and as soon as something goes wrong it’s ‘oh, we’re signing a 40-year-old’. The midfielder won the League One play-offs with Charlton in 2019 and spent another two campaigns on their books before being released by then manager Nigel Adkins.

arts.ttl: Preview: Leyton Orient vs. Charlton Athletic - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's League One clash between Leyton Orient and Charlton Athletic, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
